feed.title: Hermosawave Photography
feed.subtitle: A series of daily landscape photographs by Daniel Sofer, over 18 years running.

entry.title: Bullet Trains・新幹線
entry.content:
Bullet trains (Shinkansen) meet one another at Hamamatsu Station.

新幹線が浜松駅で出会う。
entry.summary: Bullet trains (Shinkansen) meet one another at Hamamatsu Station.

entry.title: Osaka Castle・大阪城
entry.content:
Super wide-angle shot shows Osaka Castle with nearby modern office buildings.

超広角で大阪城とその周辺の近代的なオフィスビルを撮影。
entry.summary: Super wide-angle shot shows Osaka Castle with nearby modern office buildings.

entry.title: Katsura Dawn・桂川の夜明け
entry.content:
Early morning color in the clouds over the Katsura River in Arashiyama.

早朝、嵐山の桂川にかかる雲の色。
entry.summary: Early morning color in the clouds over the Katsura River in Arashiyama.

entry.title: Rainbow Bridge・レインボー・ブリッジ

link.title: Rainbow Bridge・レインボー・ブリッジ

entry.content:
Bright rainbow from the Sanjo Ohashi Bridge.

三条大橋から虹を眺めました。
entry.summary: Bright rainbow from the Sanjo Ohashi Bridge.

entry.title: Karasuma Street・烏丸通
entry.content:
Looking north up Karasuma Dori at dusk from Kyoto Tower, showing the mix of old and new, and the mountains that surround the city.

烏丸通を北に向かって見ると、新旧の建物が混在し、街を囲む山々が見えます。
entry.summary: Looking north up Karasuma Dori at dusk from Kyoto Tower, showing the mix of old and new, and the mountains that surround the city.

entry.title: Sagano Cosmos・嵯峨野のコソモス

link.title: Sagano Cosmos・嵯峨野のコソモス

entry.content:
Cosmos in bloom in the Sagano farm fields near Hirosawa Pond.

広沢池近くの嵯峨野に咲くコスモス。
entry.summary: Cosmos in bloom in the Sagano farm fields near Hirosawa Pond.

entry.title: Kyoto City Hall・京都市役所

link.title: Kyoto City Hall・京都市役所

entry.content:
The 1927 Kyoto City Hall building, recently reopened after a several year long renovation.

1927年に建てられた京都市役所は、数年に及ぶ改修工事を経て、最近リニューアルオープンしました。
entry.summary: The 1927 Kyoto City Hall building, recently reopened after a several year long renovation.

entry.title: Purple Berries・紫ベリー
entry.content:
Purple Beautyberries on a rainy day at Tenryuji Temple. In Japanese, their name is "Murasaki Shikibu," named after the author of The Tale of Genji.

雨降った朝で、天龍寺に「紫式部」のベリーを見ます。
entry.summary: Purple Beautyberries on a rainy day at Tenryuji Temple. In Japanese, their name is "Murasaki Shikibu," named after the author of The Tale of Genji.

entry.title: Arashiyama Sunrise・嵐山の日出
entry.content:
Sun rises over the Togetsu Bridge. A heron stands on a rock looking for breakfast (center), while ducks feed on bread crumbs tossed by local residents off-camera to the left.

渡月橋から昇る太陽。岩の上で朝食を探すサギ（中）と、カメラの外で住民が投げたパンくずを食べるカモ（左）。
entry.summary: Sun rises over the Togetsu Bridge. A heron stands on a rock looking for breakfast (center), while ducks feed on bread crumbs tossed by local residents off-camera to the left.

entry.title: Twilight on the Bay・湾のトワイライト

link.title: Twilight on the Bay・湾のトワイライト

entry.content:
Above, looking southwest at the city of Kobe and the Osaka Bay from Mt. Rokko. The islands of Shikoku and Awaji are in the distance. Below, looking southeast at more of Kobe, with Osaka in the distance.

上の写真は、六甲山から神戸の街と大阪湾を眺める。 遠くには四国や淡路島が見える。下、南東方向に神戸を眺め。遠くに大阪を見ています。
entry.summary: Above, looking southwest at the city of Kobe and the Osaka Bay from Mt. Rokko. The islands of Shikoku and Awaji are in the distance. Below, looking southeast at more of Kobe, with Osaka in the distance.
